data.comment: Today's referee, Kim Woo-sung, has blown to start the match.
Kim Woo-sung awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Seongnam.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
In the minute 6, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Daegu Stadium.
Daegu's Dejan Damjanovic is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Kim Woo-sung signals a Daegu throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu just outside Seongnam's area.
In the minute 9, Goal kick for Seongnam at Daegu Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for Daegu in Daegu.
Goal! Daegu take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Dejan Damjanovic.
In the minute 10, That's a fine assist from Cesinha.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Cesinha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Daegu.
In the minute 17, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kim Jae-woo for Daegu who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Daeguâ€™s Kim Jae-woo is on his feet again at Daegu Stadium.
Throw-in Daegu.
In the minute 18, Seongnam to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Seongnam drives forward and Yang Dong-hyeon gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Daegu.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Park Tae-jun hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Daegu for Seongnam.
In the minute 34, Can Seongnam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Daegu's half?
Free kick in a good position for Seongnam!
Kim Woo-sung awards Daegu a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kim Jae-woo (Daegu) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 38, Great finish from Cesinha to give Daegu a 2-0 lead.
Dejan Damjanovic instrumental with a fine assist.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu in their own half.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Daegu territory.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Daegu.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Seongnam throw-in in Daegu's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
In the minute 45, Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu.
The first-half is over at Daegu Stadium.
Lee Chang-yong (Seongnam) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 45, Kim Dong-hyeon with an assist there.
The second half has started at Daegu Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Park Su-il with Hong Si-hoo. This is the first substitution made today by Nam Il Kim.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu.
In the minute 49, Seongnam's Na Sangho gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Kim Woo-sung awards Daegu a goal kick.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Daegu.
In the minute 51, Daegu have a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung waits before resuming play because Jeong Seung-won for Daegu is still down.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 53, Daegu's Jeong Seung-won is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 53, Can Daegu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Throw-in Seongnam.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 55, Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
In Daegu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Goal! Na Sangho levels the match at 2-2.
In the minute 60, Great play from Hong Si-hoo to set up the goal.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Throw-in for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 64, Dejan Damjanovic scores with a header and the home team now lead 3-2.
Jeong Seung-won instrumental with a fine assist.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Daegu.
In the minute 68, Na Sangho for Seongnam has been booked by Kim Woo-sung and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Daegu.
Cesinha (Daegu) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 70, Goal kick for Seongnam at Daegu Stadium.
Throw-in for Daegu in the half of Seongnam.
Daegu's Cesinha breaks free at Daegu Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 71, Seongnam have a goal kick.
The home team replace Dejan Damjanovic with Edgar Silva.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Seongnam throw-in in Daegu's half.
In the minute 74, Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Seongnam, close to Daegu's area.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
Lee Byeong-keun is making the team's second substitution at Daegu Stadium with Kim Dae-won replacing Tsubasa Nishi.
In the minute 75, Seongnam are coming forward and Kim Dong-hyeon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Daegu goal kick.
Daegu to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
In the minute 76, Kim Woo-sung awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Nam Il Kim (Seongnam) is making a second substitution, with Tomislav Kis replacing Yang Dong-hyeon.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
Goal kick for Daegu at Daegu Stadium.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Daegu.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
Daegu pushes forward through Park Han-Bin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 85, Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In Daegu Daegu attack through Park Han-Bin. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Daegu.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Ahn Yeong-kyu is replacing Park Tae-jun for Seongnam at Daegu Stadium.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Daegu in their own half.
Corner awarded to Seongnam.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Daegu Daegu drive forward through Kim Dae-won. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Daegu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Edgar Silva for Daegu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Park Han-Bin for Daegu drives towards goal at Daegu Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Daegu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Daegu needs to be cautious. Seongnam have an attacking throw-in.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Lee Byeong-keun (Daegu) is making a third substitution, with Jo Jin-woo replacing Jeong Seung-won.
Daegu's Edgar Silva has been booked in Daegu.
